subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: After Sunday’s practice, Nets Coach Avery Johnson said that his team didn’t have a “hit-first mentality,” a concern that sounded like an alarm bell with 11 days to go until opening night.
snippet: After Sunday’s practice, Nets Coach Avery Johnson said that his team didn’t have a “hit-first mentality,” a concern that sounded like an alarm bell with 11 days to go until opening night.
